label: CropProduceBatch
comment: A group of crop produce considered or dealt with together.

datatypeProperties.comment: A treatment, expressed as text, applied to this crop produce batch.
The break up date, time, date time, or other date time value for this experience event.
The creation date, time, date time, or other date time value for this payment trade settlement.
The value of the nominal size for this crop produce batch.
The product name, expressed as text, for this crop produce batch.
The measure of the size of this specified binary file.
An agricultural certificate specified for this crop plot.
An agricultural characteristic specified for this crop plot.
A crop produce specified for this crop produce batch.
The quantity specified for this crop produce batch.
A code specifying a type of MDH health indication.
A number of units for this supply chain event.

referencedBy.comment: A crop produce batch harvested in the crop production for this agricultural process.
An input batch crop produce, such as seed or fertilizer, specified for this crop produce.
An output batch crop produce, such as potatoes, grain, straw, specified for this crop produce.
